# GitHub Copilot Agents

This directory is reserved for GitHub Copilot agent configurations.

Agents can be configured to assist with:
- Code review automation
- Security scanning
- Documentation generation
- Testing assistance

## Directory Purpose

The `.github/agents` directory is part of the GitHub Copilot Workspace infrastructure, allowing teams to define custom agent behaviors for their repository.

## Note

This directory is currently empty but reserved for future agent configurations.
